title: Bloomberg Markets: Crowe on Impact of Amzon Deal on Real Estate
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Crowe on Impact of Amzon Deal on Real Estate
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Scott Crowe Chief Investment Strategist Centersquare Investment Management Inc Discussing impact of the Amazon.com deal to buy Whole Food Markets on commercial real estate. He says move is unequivocally good for real estate, but supports a significant bifurcation between good and bad retail real estate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
